title: My History With Piracy (Confession and Apology)
author: themirrazz

diversity.reason: The majority of themirrazz' friends are online, which is something you don't hear about in people that often.

role_models.reason: themirrazz apologies for past mistakes and promises not to repeat those same mistakes.

education.reason: Can teach kids that when you make a mistake, its important to apologize and try not to make that mistake again.
